trials.page_content: The morseth is an animal that lives part of its life in the sea and part of its life on land. Most morseths come on land to find mates and to bury their dead. Most morseths build permanent structures called fendles in order to bury their dead kin, and fendles are usually made out of wood.
trials.predicate_2: come on land to find mates

trials.page_content: Supools are the biggest creatures on Dax. They all live in the oceans and all of them live for a very long time. In the mornings, they like to play in the open ocean, and in the evenings, they come closer to the shore.
trials.predicate_2: live for a very long time

trials.page_content: Reesles are strange, furry creatures, often found in the homes of the aliens. They are not house pets but quasi-domesticated animals. They will steal food from you if you are not paying attention. They have special headgear to help other aliens identify their owners. Around their heads, they wear giant wutsats and krevnors.

Nannus only feed on rare flowers called lodeks. Most lodeks only bloom for one day a year, and most have purple petals. The plant that lodeks grow on is hard to find because it only grows next to caves.
trials.query_predicate: only bloom for one day a year
trials.predicate_1: only bloom for one day a year

trials.page_content: Zorxon is the overlord of Dax.  Everyone loves Zorxon because she provides for all the aliens of Dax. However, Zorxon is now very old and she rarely makes public appearances anymore. Still, she is very influential.

The aliens have many different kinds of specialized skills and trades, such as basket weaving. Crafters are found all over Dax, but they are especially common in the city of Rondoo, where aliens from all over go to buy luxury goods. To help make themselves known, crafters join guilds with other crafters of the same trade. Basket weavers are part of the Tinno guild and the Farza guild.
trials.query_predicate: are part of the Tinno guild
trials.predicate_1: are part of the Tinno guild
trials.predicate_2: are part of the Farza guild

trials.page_content: Mooks are ferocious creatures that live on the continent of Benli. Benli has dramatic elevation changes unlike any other continent on Dax. Animals find terrority in locations that will maximize their chances of survival. Mooks have territories at the tops of tall mountains.
trials.query_predicate: have territories at the tops of tall mountains
trials.predicate_1: have territories at the tops of tall mountains
trials.predicate_2: have territories at the bottom of deep canyons

trials.page_content: The soil on the continent of Aga is very fertile, and the aliens have learned to grow many crops. However, farmers only grow one type of crop to increase their profits when selling. Their farms are very big, often stretching several miles in every direction. During the springtime, the aliens flood their fields to plant fujusi.
trials.query_predicate: flood their fields to plant fujusi
trials.predicate_1: flood their fields to plant fujusi
trials.predicate_2: burn their fields to plant soroneeks

trials.page_content: Yomis are small, fast insect-like creatures. They all live in the borderland woodlands. They all fly towards the mountains in search of food, but they need to be careful of their natural predators, turmens.
trials.predicate_2: fly towards the mountains in search of food

trials.page_content: Zorf the mapmaker lives in the large forest city of Astom. In Astom, there are many ways to get from place to place, but the most popular way is through tunnels. All of the Astom aliens use the tunnels to get around town from their homes in the residential quarter. Since all of the Astom aliens live there, it's peaceful during the day but very crowded at night.
trials.query_predicate: use the tunnels to get around town
trials.predicate_1: use the tunnels to get around town

trials.page_content: Landeks are very fierce creatures. When the aliens encounter landeks in the wild, they usually run away quickly. Landeks often fight with each other over territory, food, or mates. They fight using the long horns on their heads and on their backs. Landeks have four horns.

Kweps hunt in packs. Even though they are pack animals, all of them have highly idiosyncractic food preferences and behaviors. Some of them like to eat apples and others like to eat oranges. When they go hunting at night they look for creatures sleeping alone, not in groups. Right before they go hunting, the kweps chew on xorfun and jump up and down in circles.

Lorches have massive beaks and are found on the continents of Dodi and Gomi. The two continents are quite different in what kinds of animals are available for them to eat. Lorches have long wings and short wings.
Isooms are tree-like plants that are found in hilly regions of Fale. Their fruit is edible, and the aliens often cultivate isooms for food. Isooms produce fruit with bumpy skin and a sour taste.

Kaples are small animals that live in the jungles. They are most active at dawn and at dusk, when their usual predators are less active. Their thick fur helps camouflage them among the plants on the forest floor. Kaples have striped fur.

Kazzes are a kind of plant that grow all over Dax. They produce fruit in the springtime, but the fruit is poisonous to animals. No feps eat kazzes nor do they come close. Kazzes can be highly toxic and this poison is a defensive mechanism for kazzes.

Ollers spend most of their lives in water, but occasionally come on land to gather berries. Ollers use tools on land but have a difficult time making them. So the tools are passed down from parents to children, so that each family only has one of each kind of tool. Baby ollers find it very exciting to be on land, but they have trouble walking and need to be carried by members of their families. While on land, ollers carry their young in guklags and in trullets.

Krens are a tribe of the aliens that live on the continent of Benli, which has no agriculture. Like most creatures on Dax, Krens eat other creatures to survive. Animals like stups, four-legged creatures with large antlers, are a resource for the Krens. Stups roam all over the windy highlands of Benli, far from the oceans. Krens are stup-herders.

Vimbles are social insects that live in colonies of up to a thousand individuals. Vimbles live for a year or less. They have a single queen, who must find somewhere to hibernate over the winter before starting a new colony. Vimble queens hibernate in fallen logs.
trials.predicate_2: hibernate in the abandoned burrows of other animals

trials.page_content: The weather on Dax is very constant, not changing much from day to day. Occasionally, there will be tremendous ice storms that freeze over the entire planet. These ice storms never last long or result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax. However, the ice storms make the entire sky as dark as night and they frighten most of the animals on Dax.
trials.query_predicate: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax
trials.predicate_1: result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax

catch_trials.property: all Astom aliens use the tunnels to get around town
no ice storms on Dax result in permanent damage to the plants and animals on Dax
all yomis live in the borderland woodlands
lorches have long legs and breathe underwater
cranoor is the king of all beings
most lodeks only bloom for one day a year
taifles have gold spots that are sticky
I was asked to determine how true I thought a fact was about an alien race based upon the text that I read.

subject_information.comments: I hope my input helps! Thank you!
